items.content_html:
Description

Suggested changing the word "index" to "item" on line 20 : " that iterates the value of each item in the array."

Motivation

I initially was confused when first reading this because it references "index", where I believe "item" makes more sense.

Additional details

Related issues and pull requests
items.title: Update index.md

items.content_html: This PR is a part of a project to format all of the documents using Prettier, and then enforce Prettier formatting for the files going forward. This PR formats a few files within already-formatted folders that need reformatting.
items.title: Format some files with Prettier

items.title: fix grammatical issues in multimedia

items.content_html:
Description

Documents the composition of the content script global.

Motivation

Content scripts in extensions behave somewhat consistently across browsers, except when they don't. This is currently not clearly documented, and occasionally confuses extension developers.

Additional details

Related bugs:

  • https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1208775 (and linked bugs)
  • https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1288284

Examples of bugs showing confusion from extension developers:

  • https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1577400
  • https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1681809
  • https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1814898

Related issues and pull requests

None
items.title: Document composition of content script global
